summary: This document is a visitor authorization record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 7, 2019. It authorizes attorney Martin Weinberg to visit inmate Jeffrey Epstein, confirming Weinberg is in good standing in Massachusetts.

persons.name: Martin Weinberg
persons.context: Attorney in good standing in Massachusetts who is authorized to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center whom Martin Weinberg is authorized to visit.

connections.description: Weinberg is authorized as an attorney to visit Epstein in prison, indicating a legal representation relationship.

events.title: Attorney Visit Authorization
events.description: Martin Weinberg is formally authorized to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: On July 7, 2019, attorney Martin Weinberg was authorized to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document confirms Martin Weinberg was an attorney in good standing in Massachusetts at that time.
This record establishes a formal attorney-client relationship between Weinberg and Epstein during Epstein's incarceration.
